1.0.name: wordpress/wp-punchcard
1.0.description:
Easy social bookmarking for Wordpress with PunchCard (the bundled version is 1.4):

  1. PunchCard lets your readers submit your content to their social bookmarking sites with extreme simplicity
  2. PunchCard shrinks 40 target sites in a very little space, so that you save real estate of your pages
  3. PunchCard preserves the (40) target icons, while sharing a common minimal interface
  4. PunchCard is fully configurable: submitted content, target sites, shapes and colors
  5. You can add as many different PunchCards to your pages as you want
  6. As a gadget, your readers will get their cards punched where they clicked: it's for recording that they already submitted that content to that target

Examples

  • <div class="pc_STRIP"><div class="punchcard"> <object> <param name="punchcard" v
